github_token.description: Generate github OAuth token from: https://github.com/settings/tokens on your github account

REPOSITORY.description: your fork's URL or leave it as it is

REMINDER_UPDATE.description: Assistant will remind you if a new update has been pushed

COMMAND_PREFIXES.description: Any Character for Triggering Commands (eg: . , !) Separate them with spaces

time_country.description: input your timezone from this list: https://telegra.ph/Time-Zone-list-for-Nana-Remix-07-21

IBM_WATSON_CRED_URL.description: IBM HOST URL, visit https://t.me/nanabotsupport for more help

IBM_WATSON_CRED_PASSWORD.description: IBM HOST PASSWORD, visit https://t.me/nanabotsupport for more help

screenshotlayer_API.description: get the api key from https://screenshotlayer.com

PM_PERMIT.description: Pass 'True' if you want to keep Pm Guard on. else leave empty

lydia_api.description: fill in your api key from https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net

remove_bg_api.description: get your api key from https://remove.bg

USERBOT_LOAD.description: Fill if you want to load up some modules for your userbot (separate with space)

USERBOT_NOLOAD.description: Fill if you want to ignore some modules for your userbot (separate with space)

ASSISTANT_LOAD.description: Fill if you want to load up some modules for your ASSISTANT (separate with space)

ASSISTANT_NOLOAD.description: Fill if you want to ignore some modules for your ASSISTANT (separate with space)

USERBOT_SESSION.description: Generate your session using strNana.py in the repository

sw_api.description: read spamwatch documentation on how to get the API KEY https://docs.spamwat.ch
